A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class client.GUI
Change GUI appearance when user clicks on buttons

C

chatroom - package chatroom
 
client - package client
 
Client - Class in client
A Client object is an object that will handle connections to the server, as well as sending and reading messages.
Client(String) - Constructor for class client.Client
Creates the socket, searches for the input and output stream, creates the sender and reciever threads and starts them.

D

delFirstElemFromList() - Method in class client.Client
Deletes the first element in the list of messages recieved by the reciever thread.
disconnect() - Method in class client.Client
Stops the execution of the threads and closes the socket

G

getContent() - Method in class chatroom.Message
Gets the content of the message.
getFirstElemFromList() - Method in class client.Client
Gets the first Message recieved from the reciever thread.
getSender() - Method in class chatroom.Message
Gets the message sender.
getStringTime() - Method in class chatroom.Message
Gets the time of the message in a human readable format "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss".
getTime() - Method in class chatroom.Message
Gets the time of the message in a computer readable format.
getType() - Method in class chatroom.Message
Gets the type of the message.
GUI - Class in client
A GUI object is the Window that will appear to the user.
GUI() - Constructor for class client.GUI
 

H

hash(String) - Method in class client.Client
Calls the method hash(pwd) from Secure to hash a password.
hash(String) - Method in class client.Secure
Hashes the password, then restitues the hash as a String object.
HomeGUI() - Method in class client.GUI
The Home Window.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class client.GUI
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class server.Server
 
Message - Class in chatroom
A Message object is an object that contains the author, the time when it was created, the content as well as a type.
Message(String, String, int) - Constructor for class chatroom.Message
Sets the parameters of the message as well as the time at wich it was created.

R

Reciever - Class in chatroom
A Reciever object is a Thread that will constantly check for new messages and write them in a LinkedList.
Reciever(ObjectInputStream, ObjectOutputStream, LinkedList<Message>) - Constructor for class chatroom.Reciever
Sets the input and output streams using ThreadTemplate's constructor as well as the list to store incoming messages.
run() - Method in class chatroom.Reciever
Always reads what is coming from the input stream.
run() - Method in class server.Server
Main processing function of the server.

S

Secure - Class in client
A Secure object is used to hash passwords, using the SHA-512 algorithm.
Secure() - Constructor for class client.Secure
 
send(Message) - Method in class chatroom.Sender
Sends a message through the output stream.
send(Message) - Method in class client.Client
Tells the sender thread to send a message to the server.
Sender - Class in chatroom
A Sender object is a Thread that will send new messages.
Sender(ObjectInputStream, ObjectOutputStream) - Constructor for class chatroom.Sender
Sets the input and output stream using ThreadTemplate's constructor.
server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
A Server object is an object that will handle all the incoming connections from the clients as well as all the messages.
Server() - Constructor for class server.Server
Creates the socket, searches for the input and output stream, creates the sender and reciever threads and starts them.

T

ThreadTemplate - Class in chatroom
ThreadTemplate is an abstract class to group networking threads with a common constructor.
ThreadTemplate(ObjectInputStream, ObjectOutputStream) - Constructor for class chatroom.ThreadTemplate
Sets the input and output streams.
